name: Exercise 1 - Rube Goldberg Machine
description: It's a DOMINO EFFECT! I created a ramp for a ball to roll down into the dominos. The dominos will knock each other down until the last domino hits the lever I made. On one side of the lever is a light cube and on the other side is the giant domino hitting the lever. This will cause the domino to fly up in the air until it lands on the floating platform.
